title: Practical Training Program for Improving Metadata Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental information management and educational administration experience
context.additional_context: Targeting managers aiming to strengthen corporate educational material management capabilities, combining classroom-based practice with digital device utilization

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain evaluation criteria for the accuracy and completeness of Dublin Core-based metadata at over 80% proficiency.

Learners can identify and correct metadata quality issues (relationship representation, subject selection, controlled vocabulary application) at over 70% accuracy through comparative analysis exercises.
Learners can design a high-quality metadata creation process applicable to real educational materials in three or more stages through project implementation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
